name: Certification required for mechanics prior to licensure
text:
§437B-24  Certification required for mechanics prior to [licensure].  (a)  Except as provided in subsection (b) below, every mechanic applying for [licensure] shall have passed the appropriate certification test provided for in this chapter.
     (b)  Notwithstanding any provision of this chapter, any person who has been engaged as a motor vehicle mechanic for a period of at least two years prior to January 1, 1976, and who has applied for [licensure] as a motor vehicle mechanic under this chapter on or before June 30, 1976, shall not be required to take the certification test prescribed in this chapter prior to [licensure]. [L 1975, c 143, pt of §2; am L 1998, c 199, §8]
